==============================
Amnesia.exe caused an EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION in module  at 0023:0000000
==============================

For those having problems with being asked for a serial:

You need to temporarily give your current - restricted - user account administrator rights. That did the trick for me.

I suspect the problem was that without that I had to supply the admin-data for the install, which caused the cracked parts to be written into the wrong user directory.
thx very much uploader...its good to know that many people are still playing these quality horror games.

It's the full game. The level editor will be released at a later date.

About the small size: the installer uses the LZMA algorithm, which feaures a (very) high compression ratio. The installed game will occupy 1.8 GBs of data on your hard drive. 

If you're asked for a serial: install the game from an administrator account, as the installer must be able to copy a small file containing the serial number in the 'My Documents' folder of your account. If you don't want to reinstall the game, use the following serial number: THETA9211H1PBD.

About the other errors mentioned: I was not able to reproduce them, so right now I can't help you.

Hey guys. I just bought this game after trying out the demo and downloading this through torrent. I had it seeding and uploaded around 10GB.
If you can, just buy the game like I did after trying it out and finding out how freaking awesome it is. Frictional Games deserves our support, in my opinion. Its just 20â‚¬.
I would totally want to see more from them. And now they don't even have the support from Paradox so their success and future depends on the outcome of Amnesia.

So to conclude, my philosophy is this: If its a great game, then buy it. Specially if its made by a small independent team.

Long live the pirate bay. And always remember to be ethical enough to support the stuff you love, when you can.

peace
Buy the game, support indie developers! Amnesia: TDD is freaking awesome!

@9em
I've scanned this with Malwarebytes, SUPERantispyware, Prevx, Avira Antivir, Spybot Search & Destroy, Hitman Pro, Windows Defender, and Microsoft Security Essentials.

If you check av comparitives, you can see that both MSE and AntiVir are among the highest rated for both heuristic and definition-based detection. I wouldn't worry about it. I've installed it, and it's been just over a week with nothing suspicious happening. My HIPS also detect nothing. 

You have every right to be suspicious and worried, but I'd say your fear is misplaced here :)

To the one that said that this can't be played on a laptop with integrated video - I've played this on my HP DV5 with an ATI Radeon HD 4250 - Not on the HIGHEST settings, but it's definately playable especially with HDMI out.  You might want to make sure your video drivers are the newest, and allocate at least 512 MB for video (This goes to 3 GB, 512 MB standard).

I love this game.  EXTREMELY creepy, and the sound really sells it.  Take my advice and get a good set of headphones if you're on a laptop, it'll be worth it!  Pretty speedy download, too.  I used to use Daemontools to mount it but I heard there's a better program - Is this true?

Overall, great quality - And nothing extra that makes it a PITA to install.  Keep up the good work!
